useCase.name: Generate Surat Lapas
useCase.description: Generate a surat lapas for a specific date and number
useCase.trigger: User clicks on the surat lapas menu

mainSequence.step: Administrator clicks on the surat lapas menu
Administrator inputs the surat number and date
System searches for the surat based on the input
System retrieves information about the inmates
System informs Administrator that the surat is not available
